links.description: Technology and Financials Help Contain Losses [BRIEFING.COM] Equity indices are hovering near their recent levels, showing losses between 0.1% and 0.4%. links.title: 10 Ways BlackBerry makes Android BETTER | Key2 Explored
links.description: BlackBerry has launched several Android phones in the UK recently, including 2018's new Key2 handset. BlackBerry and Android make a (near) perfect pairing: you get full access to Google Play, while BB has added a host of great features to Android. In our opinion, making it all the better.
